resources.string: Click to expand or close recipe description
Creamy pasta with eggs, Pecorino cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
Photo by Zoran Borojevic on Unsplash
Stir-fried rice noodles with tamarind sauce, peanuts, egg, and shrimp or tofu.
Photo by John Aledia on Unsplash
Eggs poached in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce, often served with bread.
Marinated pork sliced thin and grilled on a spit, served in soft corn tortillas.
Grilled chicken in a creamy tomato curry sauce — a British-Indian classic.
Spiced tomato-based rice with onions, bell peppers, and protein of choice.
Aromatic beef broth with rice noodles, herbs, and thinly sliced beef.
A rich baked or fried ham and cheese sandwich with béchamel sauce.
Baked layers of eggplant, ground lamb, and creamy béchamel sauce.
Thinly sliced marinated beef grilled or stir-fried with garlic and sesame.
Raw fish marinated in lime juice with onions, cilantro, and chili.
French fries topped with cheese curds and hot brown gravy.
A mix of rice, lentils, pasta, chickpeas, and tomato sauce with crispy onions.
Hearty beef stew with paprika, onions, and potatoes.
A vegetable stew of zucchini, eggplant, tomatoes, and herbs.
Seaweed-wrapped rice rolls with fillings like fish, cucumber, or avocado.
Dumplings stuffed with potato, cheese, or meat, often pan-fried.
Cornmeal cakes filled with cheese, meats, or beans.
Spicy coconut noodle soup with seafood or chicken.
Layered rice dish with saffron, meat, fried onions, and spices.
Ground meat topped with mashed potatoes and baked.
Slow-cooked beef in coconut milk and spices until tender and caramelized.
Grilled steak served with a garlicky herb sauce.
Sautéed beef with mushrooms in a sour cream sauce, served over noodles or rice.
Chicken coconut soup with galangal, lemongrass, and lime.
Crispy breaded cutlet with a savory Japanese curry sauce over rice.
Sweet layers of phyllo pastry, nuts, and syrup or honey.
Marinated roast beef, slow-cooked and served with gravy.
Rice bowl with veggies, meat, egg, and gochujang chili paste.
Crispy chickpea balls with creamy hummus, pita, and salad.
Indian street food that consists of a crispy, hollow, deep-fried puri filled with a mixture of mashed potatoes, chickpeas, raw onions, and spices, then soaked in a flavored water.
